name: Docker
description: Build a docker image, push it to registry and run a docker container. Or run any docker command.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: dockerServiceEndpoint
inputs.label: Docker connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Docker endpoint, set the certs and url.

inputs.name: dockerRegistryServiceEndpoint
inputs.label: Docker Hub connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Docker Hub endpoint, to login to Docker Hub.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory where the certs folder will be created.

inputs.name: context
inputs.label: Context
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the folder to build from.

inputs.name: imageName
inputs.label: Image name
inputs.visibleRule: action = Build an image || action = Publish image || action = Run a container
inputs.helpMarkDown: name of the image to run

inputs.name: containerName
inputs.label: Container Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name to use for Docker container.

inputs.name: envVars
inputs.label: Environment Variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name value pairs to pass as environments variables to the run commnad in name=value format.

inputs.name: ports
inputs.label: Ports
inputs.helpMarkDown: Port mappings to pass to the run commnad in port:port format.

inputs.name: removeImageAfterPublish
inputs.label: Remove image after publish
inputs.visibleRule: action = Publish image && action = always hide for now because of async publish
inputs.helpMarkDown: When true the image is force removed after publishing.

inputs.name: customCommand
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Docker command with arguments to execute.

inputs.name: additionalArgs
inputs.label: Additional arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments to pass to the run command.
